entries.title: Google is offering your SMB website free anti-terrorism moderation tools
entries.description: Reports of an anti-terrorism moderation tool have emerged from Google’s Jigsaw division, but it’s far from ready.

entries.title: TCL’s 2023 TVs: bigger, brighter mini-LED, and QD-OLED too
entries.description: TCL's new mini-LED TVs feature a record-setting number of local dimming zones, but the bigger news is the company's first QD-OLED models.

entries.title: New Qi2 standard set to improve wireless charging, with a bit of help from Apple
entries.description: Launching at the end of 2023, the newly dubbed Qi2 builds on top of Apple's MagSafe tech to boost charging speeds.

entries.title: Nanoleaf's hands-free lights could be smarter than Philips Hue
entries.description: Nanoleaf has unveiled a new range of Philips Hue-rivaling smart light products at CES 2023.

entries.title: New Linux malware found targeting WordPress sites
entries.description: WordPress sites with vulnerable add-ons targeted again, with Trojans capable of redirecting visitors.

entries.title: Security breaches shut down anti-government trucker protests
entries.description: Some organizers want to abandon the idea of a repeat protest, but not everyone agrees.

entries.title: WowWee Dog-E is a robot pet that's finally completely unique to you
entries.description: WowWee launches Mintid Dog-E, the mintable robot dog at CES 2023.

entries.title: In the metaverse, no one can hear you scream – with this privacy microphone
entries.description: At CES 2023, Shiftall is showing a VR controller that you can use while drinking and typing, and a privacy microphone.

entries.title: Amazon secures $8bn loan to secure itself against market turbulence
entries.description: Amazon’s market cap has plummeted as it turns to a large loan to weather the economic storm ahead.

entries.title: Best audio tech at CES 2023: next-gen soundbars, headphones and earbuds
entries.description: All of the latest audio news from CES 2023, including new soundbars, speakers, earbuds and headphones.

entries.title: Naim's all-new trio at CES 2023 makes me want to rediscover classic hi-fi setups
entries.description: A streaming pre-amp, an upgraded superstar of a power amp, and a dedicated power supply – what's not to love?

entries.title: Nanoleaf Skylight is a modular light the first of its kind – and it's Matter-compatible
entries.description: The upcoming Nanoleaf Skylight, unveiled at CES 2023, offers users complete control over the design arrangement and area of cover.

entries.title: Panasonic just fixed the biggest weakness of its Lumix mirrorless cameras
entries.description: Panasonic has just launched the new Lumix S5II and S5IIX full-frame cameras at CES 2023 – and they finally deliver a modern autofocus system.

entries.title: Foundation season 2 trailer teases a new Seldon Crisis – and a launch window
entries.description: The first trailer for Foundation season 2 has landed online – and it comes packaged with a launch window for the sci-fi series.

entries.title: Microsoft and OpenAI could be bringing ChatGPT to Bing Search
entries.description: Reports follow reticence from Google’s top brass to implement artificial intelligence across its flagship search engine for browsers.

entries.title: The best fitness kit at CES 2023: Next-gen smartwatches, sleep trackers, cycling and more
entries.description: The best fitness, health and sleep tech at CES 2023, includig wearables, cycling gear and more

entries.title: Upcoming games 2023: the biggest release dates for console and PC
entries.description: You’ll find the biggest upcoming games, and their release dates, right here.

entries.title: Samsung shows off two new curved monitors at CES 2023 and we’re obsessed
entries.description: New curved monitors from Samsung have been announced and we're looking at our favourite models

entries.title: Salesforce is laying off thousands more workers and closing offices
entries.description: 2022 was riddled with tech layoffs, and it seems that the trend is far from reaching an end yet.

entries.title: I'm thinking of ditching my Apple Watch for this solar and body heat-powered band
entries.description: Bheart unveils a solar-powered smart band at CES 2023 that works with any watch.

entries.title: Synology patches maximum risk flaw in its VPN routers
entries.description: "10/10" flaw could have caused data corruption, system crashes, and more.

entries.title: AMD RX 7900 XTX GPU cooler issue could make Nvidia RTX 4090 problems look like small fry
entries.description: If the rumblings from the grapevine are right, this might be a seriously costly mistake for AMD.

entries.title: Is File Explorer in Windows 11 popping to the front for you? You're not alone
entries.description: While tabs in File Explorer have been great to use, the feature hasn’t been without its bugs, so where are the fixes?

entries.title: Roborock's new S8 Pro Ultra vacuum is better at cleaning up the place and itself
entries.description: The upcoming Roborock S8 Pro, unveiled at CES 2023, can scan the floors of your house to avoid obstacles.

entries.title: Watch out Amazon: Roku to expand hardware lineup with Roku-branded TVs
entries.description: With its announcement of a full line of Roku-branded TVs, the company now offers a full AV hardware ecosystem.

entries.title: HP reveals its vision of the future of hybrid working
entries.description: PC maker launches new laptops, monitors and earbuds at CES 2023 aimed at those working from home.

entries.title: Sony is right to not announce any new TVs at CES 2023
entries.description: Sony is right to focus on PlayStation VR 2 and its electric vehicle at CES 2023 instead of boring TVs.

entries.title: The best thing Game Freak made that isn't Pokémon is getting a remake
entries.description: Game Freak isn't horsing around with this solitaire RPG game.

entries.title: This top ecommerce firm wants to end big meetings for good
entries.description: Employees warned to be judicious about the meetings they take, and to only to do so on a specific day.

entries.title: Best laptops at CES 2023: 3D OLED tech, new gaming laptops, and everything else
entries.description: As usual, CES has given us a cavalcade of new laptops and other computer hardware to drool over.

entries.title: Intel CPU mystery unfolds as 6GHz flagship skips CES and suddenly goes on sale
entries.description: Intel’s Core i9-13900KS was a no-show at CES 2023, but has already been spotted at retailers.

entries.title: Shopify says its new advertising push will help redefine enterprise retail
entries.description: New Shopify tool promises to combine targeted ad data while remaining compliant with Apple’s ‘first-party only’ rules.

entries.title: Thousands of Microsoft Exchange servers are still vulnerable to this dangerous flaw
entries.description: A Microsoft patch has been available for months now, but tens of thousands of endpoints are still vulnerable.

entries.title: This new phishing campaign is targeting security experts across the globe
entries.description: Beware of fake stores selling popular Flipper Zero hacking gadget.

entries.title: NoWatch smartwatch doesn't have a display and that may be okay
entries.description: NoWatch replaces the traditional screen with natural gemstones

entries.title: Assassin's Creed showrunner is 'no longer involved' in the Netflix series
entries.description: Netflix's TV adaptation of the Assassin's Creed video game series is on the lookout for a new showrunner.

entries.title: Acer shows off 18-inch gaming laptop with RTX 4000 GPUs: is bigger always better?
entries.description: Acer showcased their latest addition to the Predator Helios range, and it's big.

entries.title: OnePlus Buds Pro 2 earbuds bring coaxial dual drivers in partnership with Dynaudio
entries.description: The OnePlus 11 has been unveiled, and with it, a set of all-new earbuds aimed squarely at audiophiles…

entries.title: Samsung’s 2023 TVs: smaller MicroLED, brighter mini-LED, new QD-OLED and more
entries.description: Samsung’s extensive TV introduction for 2023 include a MicroLED TV in a living room-friendly size, new QD-OLED models, and an 8K projector.

entries.title: Withings U-Scan puts urinalysis in your toilet and can recognize the signature of a stream
entries.description: Withings' new U-Scan device, announced at CES 2023, puts the power of urinalysis in any toilet
